Description: Creates base year synthetic firms by NAICS and number of jobs
Creates future year synthetic firms by NAICS and number of jobs
Creates households with number of persons by age group
Assigns number of workers by age group to households
Assigns household lifecycle category
Predict total household income
Predict household housing (single-family, multifamily, group quarters) and place each household in a Bzone
Allocate number of jobs by Bzone and type (total, retail, service) & assign jobsite Bzone to workers and create worker table
Assign development type to household (urban, rural)
Calculate Bzone density, diversity, design, and accessibility measures
Assign urban mixed use attribute to households
Identifies Bzones that have parking restrictions and prices
Identifies proportions of households participating in individualized marketing by Bzone and proportions of worker participating in employee commute options by Bzone
Identifies the level of car service (e.g. carshare, TNC) available by Bzone
Assign households and firms to the place types (bzones) for the base year
Assign households and firms to the place types (bzones) for the years that are not base year
Calculates transit revenue miles per capita for region and Bzone transit service level
Calculates regional per capita lane-miles for freeways and for arterials
Calculate freeway and arterial lane-miles per capita, and bus and rail lane miles using run year data
Calculate freeway and arterial lane-miles per capita, and bus and rail lane miles using future year data
Models roadway speeds, delay, and congestion costs using run year data
Models roadway speeds, delay, and congestion costs using future year data
Models roadway speeds, delay, and congestion costs using future year data adjusted to policy
Assigns number of drivers by age group to each household
Assign number of vehicles owned by household
Assigns numbers autos and light trucks owned by each household
Creates vehicle table and populates with household and vehicle IDs, geography, and vehicle type
Assign age to each household vehicle
Calculates the annual ownership cost of each household vehicles
Compares approximate vehicle ownership cost per mile of travel with the cost of high level car services and substitutes car service where less expensive
Assigns number of vehicles, vehicle type, and age by households using run year data
Assigns number of vehicles, vehicle type, and age by households using future year data
Calculate household DVMT on household vehicles and carshare vehicles
Calculate household walk trips, bike trips, and transit trips
Calculates household vehicle trips
Calculate proportional reduction of DVMT based on user-established goals for shifting short-range SOV tours to bike or similar "slow" modes
Reduces household DVMT to reflect travel demand management and SOV trip diversion
Calculate household, bus, truck, and vehicles dvmt using run year data
Calculate household, bus, truck, and vehicles dvmt using future year data
Calculate changes in household dvmt, vehicle ownership, and vehicle dvmt induced due to changes in transportation supply
Calculate changes in household dvmt, vehicle ownership, and vehicle dvmt caused by changes the policy by placetypes (Bzone)
Calculates the average carbon intensity of vehicle fuel by vehicle type and the carbon intensity of electricity
Assigns powertrains and their characteristics to household vehicles. Assigns powertrain characteristics to car services.
Calculates base year roadway DVMT by urbanized area, vehicle type and road class, and factors for computing future year commercial DVMT
Calculates future year roadway DVMT by urbanized area, vehicle type and road class
Calculates urbanized area roadway congestion, speeds, and delay, and splits LDV travel between freeways and arterials based on congestion and pricing
Calculates factors to adjust vehicle MPG and MPKWH by vehicle type and powertrain type to reflect the effects of travel speeds
Apply MPG and MPKWH adjustment factors to household vehicles
Calculates vehicle operating costs. Uses composite cost to allocate household DVMT among vehicles. Calculates household average cost per vehicle mile
Adjust household DVMT when necessary to fit within household budget. Calculate total household fuel and electricity consumption and CO2e production
Calculate energy consumption and emissions of light-duty commercial service vehicles and heavy trucks
Calculate energy consumption and emissions from public transit vehicles
Calculates performance metrics for RPAT
